    • authenticate

      boolean authenticate​(String username, String password)
      Method to authenticate user
      Parameters:
      username - - user name (email address)
      password - - user password
      Returns:
      boolean - true is authenticated, false otherwise

    • inputsValid

      boolean inputsValid​(String username, String password)
      Method to determine if user input information is valid
      Parameters:
      username - - user name (email) to check (not empty)
      password - - user password to check (not empty)
      Returns:
      boolean - true if valid user, false otherwise
